content.text:
# 2026 Alabama Commissioner of Agriculture and Industries election

The 2026 Alabama Commissioner of Agriculture and Industries election will be held on November 3, 2026, to elect the Alabama Commissioner of Agriculture and Industries. The primary election will be held on May 19. Two-term incumbent Rick Pate is term-limited and ineligible to run for re-election.
Republican primary
Candidates
Declared
*Corey Hill, mayor of Douglas
*Christina Woerner McInnis, farmer
*Jack Williams, state senator from the 34th district (2018–present)
Endorsements
}}
}}
*Manufacture Alabama
}}
Fundraising
In the first month of fundraising, McInnis raised over $100,000, more than what other candidates had reported.
